Posts.EditableText:
Make a hitpoints variable/attribute.
```
player.hitpoints = 30
```
Subtract the variable/attribute when you need to.
```
player.hitpoints = player.hitpoints - 1
```
You can use a timer for this, or you can put it in the room's ```onenter``` script.
